page.title: 16FARMING (cont'd)
page.content: {BAUGH},{BURYHILL},{WATERFALL}and{ {MOOREND}farms have British dairy FRIESIAN cows and some sheep. These farms sell milk to the{MILK MARKETING {BOARD}. {HOWSMOOR}and{WHITEHOUSE}farms have poultry and produce eggs for{TASTY {EGGS LTD}. The main riding stable is at{WHITE CAT {STABLES}and there is a breeder of labrador dogs and{KENNELS}on the neighbouring farm. There is also a stables at{WINTERBOURNE DOWN}. In the EAST of the block in the village of{ {HENFIELD}there are a number of market gardeners producing flowers, fruit and vegtables which are sold in the{ {BRISTOL}area. There is also a major producer of fuchsia flowers _{C. {LOCKYER}at{HENFIELD}. These plants are exported, as well as sold in this country.
